label: BreakdownStatement
comment: A detailed statement of work, prices, and dimensions for this valuation.

datatypeProperties.comment: A specified binary file referenced by this basic work item.
A changed recorded status for this basic work item.
A comment, expressed as text for this MDH illness.
The code specifying the contractual language for this basic work item.
A specified binary file used to create this valuation breakdown statement.
The creation date, time, date time, or other date time value for this payment trade settlement.
The code specifying the default currency for this valuation breakdown statement.
The code specifying the default language for this valuation breakdown statement.
A basic work item in this basic work item.
A grouped work item in this valuation breakdown statement.
A unique identifier of a method of measurement for this valuation breakdown statement.
The identifier of a price list for this valuation breakdown statement.
A specified binary file used to read this valuation breakdown statement.
A code specifying a requested action for this basic work item.
A total calculated price for this basic work item.
